articles.content: As video conferencing is becoming a norm amidst the Coronavirus lockdown, many new tools are popping up on the internet to make the video calls interesting. Avatarify is one such ridiculously creative tool that can help you become Einstein, Mona Lisa or anyon… [+1644 chars]

articles.title: Can Intel's 10th Gen desktop CPUs compete, or are they more of the same? | Upscaled Mini - Engadget
articles.description: Intel's new "Comet Lake" 10th gen desktop CPUS check a lot of boxes, up to 10 cores on a flagship, even higher boost speeds (up to 5.3GHz), and hyperthreadin...
articles.content: Intel's new "Comet Lake" 10th gen desktop CPUS check a lot of boxes, up to 10 cores on a flagship, even higher boost speeds (up to 5.3GHz), and hyperthreading down the line. But they're also still the same 14nm process and Skylake architecture we've seen over… [+589 chars]

articles.title: AirPods or HairPods: This Woman Received a Giant Pair of Fake AirPods From Amazon - News18
articles.description: According to a report in the New York Post, the lady spent nearly $62 for the fake AirPods, which normally retail for more than three times the price.
articles.content: In a shock of her life, an online shopper in Dubai was left stunned when she ordered fake wireless Apple AirPods from Amazon and received the device which was even bigger than her head in size. In a Twitter post, the Dubai user by the name of @Al33rzay said t… [+831 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp this week: Voice, video calling gets support for 8 people on Android, iOS - Hindustan Times
articles.description: WhatsApp has update its Android and iOS-based apps. Now up to 8 participants can join an audio or a video call.
articles.content: WhatsApp has been working on a number of features off lately. The company has already announced that Messenger Rooms will soon be making their way to WhatsApp. In addition to this, the company has also rolled out a new sticker pack on its platform. This week,… [+2188 chars]

articles.description: The iPhone 12 series price leaked ahead of this launch later this year. The lineup is likely to include four models and feature 120Hz display, 5G connectivity, and triple rear cameras.
